attributes.action: reinstate the excemption to VED for vehicles over 25 years old
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We believe that the freezing of the VED excemption to 1973 to be a short sighted measure.
There are groups of enthusiasts restoring and running pre 1973 vehicles, and preserving the memory of them in living history. Vehicles built after this date are fast disapearing, taking with them an important piece of British history.
The final days of British Leyland, the Austin Allegro, Morris Marina and Triumph Dolomite. The final run of the every popular Ford Cortina.
This era marked the final phase of British design for a lot of motor manufacturers, help us remember these iconic designs.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
